member.name: IMFNetCredential.GetPassword
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that receives the password. To find the required buffer size, set this parameter to NULL. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the buffer contains a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.
On input, specifies the size of the pbData buffer, in bytes. On output, receives the required buffer size. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.
If TRUE, the method returns an encrypted string. Otherwise, the method returns an unencrypted string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFNetCredential.GetUser
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that receives the user name. To find the required buffer size, set this parameter to NULL. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the buffer contains a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.
On input, specifies the size of the pbData buffer, in bytes. On output, receives the required buffer size. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.
If TRUE, the method returns an encrypted string. Otherwise, the method returns an unencrypted string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFNetCredential.LoggedOnUser
member.summary: Queries whether logged-on credentials should be used.
member.param: Receives a Boolean value. If logged-on credentials should be used, the value is TRUE. Otherwise, the value is FALSE.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFNetCredential.SetPassword
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that contains the password. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the buffer is a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.
Size of pbData, in bytes. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.
If TRUE, the password is encrypted. Otherwise, the password is not encrypted.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFNetCredential.SetUser
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that contains the user name. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the buffer is a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.
Size of pbData, in bytes. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.
If TRUE, the user name is encrypted. Otherwise, the user name is not encrypted.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFNetCredential
member.summary: Sets and retrieves user-name and password information for authentication purposes.
